#summary The roadmap of the GwtGL project.
#sidebar TableOfContents

= 0.3 =

This release will provide basic compatibility to browsers implementing WebGL 1.0 (Chrome 10, Firefox 4) and an updated version of the Typed Arrays binding.

  * (done) Update of the poms (used plugins, GWT 2.2, ...)
  * (done) spec changes
    * (done) implement changes of the Typed Arrays spec
    * (done) basic support for extensions
  * (done) Update of the Typed Arrays JavaDocs

= 0.9 =

This release will provide an improved binding for the WebGL 1.0 spec and support for the GWT 2.2 Canvas widget.

  * (todo) Improvements for the WebGLRenderingContext and WebGlCanvas
    * (todo) GWT 2.2 Canvas Support
    * (todo) Change WebGLRenderingContext to be a JavaScriptObject (the generator will be removed)
    * (todo) Generator for accessing the constants WebGL constants will be removed
    
_this release will break the existing APIs_
